content:
Capital of Tatarstan, Kazan seems to embody Russian multi-ethnicity as it is the capital of Muslims in Russia.
In Kazan I got another example of Russian generosity. I had bought an extremely cheap ticket for a Bolshoi ballet in Kazan theatre, but there was a misunderstanding and they gave me ticket for the wrong date. The administrator -rather than simply reimbursing me- offered me a folding seat at five meters from the royal box. The best seat I could dreamed of!
title: Kazan
